mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO schedule_job_tb ( create_date, cron_expression, description, job_group, job_id, job_name, job_status, method_name, type, update_date) VALUES ( #{createDate}, #{cronExpression}, #{description}, #{jobGroup}, #{jobId}, #{jobName}, #{jobStatus}, #{methodName}, #{type}, #{updateDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule_job_tb SET create_date=#{createDate}, cron_expression=#{cronExpression}, description=#{description}, job_group=#{jobGroup}, job_id=#{jobId}, job_name=#{jobName}, job_status=#{jobStatus}, method_name=#{methodName}, type=#{type}, update_date=#{updateDate} WHERE schedule_job_id=#{scheduleJobId}
mapper.select: SELECT schedule_job_id, create_date, cron_expression, description, job_group, job_id, job_name, job_status, method_name, type, update_date FROM schedule_job_tb WHERE schedule_job_id=#{scheduleJobId}
